channel.title: Kenneth Nwafor
channel.description: Website and blog of Kenneth Nwafor - Developer and Data Scientist.

item.title: 12 Days Of TechMas
item.description: During the Christmas holiday, I collected my own version of the 12 days of Christmas each day. Actually I have 13 instead of 12, but oh well, you will find out why. While many of them are based on my activities on each of those days, some are just generic tech stuff.

item.title: Django Generic Relation - multiple usage in the same model
item.description: If you have developed web services using Django, chances are that you have come across the Generic Relations. It is a technique that allows you to link a model with multiple other models without knowing them before hand. It comes in quite handy when you have common traits which can be applied to several models. A typical example is a tagging system which is used as an example in the docs.

item.title: WFYS 2017: Tale of a thrilled participant
item.description: Since this is my first post on this blog, I figured I need to to give a little background info about myself.
